abstract: The Delaware Chancery Court ruled against Grupo México in the sale of Minera México to Southern Peru Copper.
snippet: The Delaware Chancery Court ruled against Grupo México in the sale of Minera México to Southern Peru Copper.
lead_paragraph: If you think you are having a bad Monday, be happy you are not Grupo México, S.A.B. de C.V. The Delaware Chancery Court has ordered Grupo México to pay a $1.263 billion judgment to Southern Peru Copper after the latter company's acquisition of Minera México, S.A. de C.V.

headline.main: Grupo México Is Hit With $1.26 Billion Judgment
